mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( username , password , create_time, last_login_time, uuid ) VALUES( #{username} , #{password} , now(), now(), #{uuid} );
mapper.select: select id, username, password, create_time createTime, last_login_time lastLoginTime, uuid from user where username=#{username} and password =#{password}
select username from user where username=#{username}
select * from user where username=#{username} and uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.update: update user set last_login_time=now() where id=#{id}
